body_html:
This is nice, thanks for these clarifications. Apparently our documentation is in the middle of a reorganization and will be done in a week or two, and we've been told to hold off on changes to documentation this week and next, otherwise these changes will get lost in the changeover.

We can re-ping this PR once the new documentation files are up, and you can make changes to those files once they are ready. Thank you for the contribution and your patience!

body:
This is nice, thanks for these clarifications.  Apparently our documentation is in the middle of a reorganization and will be done in a week or two, and we've been told to hold off on changes to documentation this week and next, otherwise these changes will get lost in the changeover.

We can re-ping this PR once the new documentation files are up, and you can make changes to those files once they are ready.  Thank you for the contribution and your patience!
